text: École normale supérieure Paris-Saclay (also known as École normale supérieure de Cachan, ENS Cachan or ENS Paris-Saclay) is a French grande école. The school is located in Gif-sur-Yvette. The subjects of the school are applied science and sociology, economics and management. The school is a member of the University of Paris-Saclay. == Former Teacher == * Yves Meyer, French mathematician == Former Student == * Éloïc Peyrache, French Economist == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Technical colleges and universities in Paris Category:1912 establishments in France
title: École normale supérieure Paris-Saclay
